page.title: 16COMMUNICATIONS
page.content: THIS AREA IS SERVED BY POSTAL COMMUNICATIONS WITH A MORNING DELIVERY AND TWO COLLECTIONS. THERE ARE TWO PUBLIC TELEPHONES AND A HIGH PROPORTION OF THE RESIDENTS HAVE PRIVATE TELEPHONES. THE MAIN VILLAGES HAVE A DAILY NEWSPAPER DELIVERY SERVICE FROM THE NEWSAGENTS IN BOOSBECK AND THEY HAVE THE EAST CLEVELAND ADVERTISER, WHICH IS A FREE ADVERTISING PAPER, AND THE CLEVELAND CLARION, WHICH IS A FREE LOCAL NEWSPAPER, DELIVERED. THE MAJOR FREE ADVERTISING PAPER, WHICH IS CIRCULATED WIDELY IN THE WHOLE COUNTY, IS NOT DELIVEERED IN THIS AREA. ALL FOUR CURRENT TELEVISION CHANNELS CAN BE RECEIVED IN THIS AREA, AND THE LOCAL RADIO STATIONS, BBC RADIO CLEVELAND AND THE INDEPENDENT STATION RADIO TEES COVER THE AREA AS WELL AS THE NATIONAL RADIO NETWORK.
